Key Match Events: The New York Knicks lost their third straight game
Orlando Magic limited New York to just 17 points in the third quarter
Jalen Brunson tied for a team-high with 24 points but shot 8 of 21
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Knicks shot a porous 4 of 22 from 3-point land
Orlando entered the game without a single double-digit scorer on the healthy books
Others: Cole Anthony scored a team-high 24 points for Orlando
Kentavious Caldwell-Pope buried the Knicks with 15 points
